snippet: The actress lives in not one but two apartments in New York.
abstract: Tony Award-winning actress Linda Lavin loves her two Central Park South one-bedroom apartments across the hall from each other; one is a daytime living area and rehearsal space overlooking West 58th Street, and the other, which faces a courtyard, she uses for watching TV and sleeping.
lead_paragraph: The actress lives in not one but two apartments in New York.

headline.print_headline: Linda, by Day and by Night
headline.main: Linda Lavin, by Day and by Night
